flixel.system.frontEnds.PluginFrontEnd

type
class

Constructor

new()
Sets up two plugins: DebugPathDisplay in debugging mode and TimerManager

Instance Variables

list(default,null) : Array<flixel.plugin.FlxPlugin>

An array container for plugins.

Instance Methods

add(Plugin : flixel.plugin.FlxPlugin) : flixel.plugin.FlxPlugin

parameters
Plugin Any object that extends FlxPlugin. Useful for managers and other things. See flixel.plugin for some examples!
returns
The same FlxPlugin-based plugin you passed in.
Adds a new plugin to the global plugin array.

inline draw() : Void

Used by the game object to call draw() on all the plugins.

inline drawDebug() : Void

You shouldn't need to call this. Used to draw the debug graphics for any installed plugins.

get(ClassType : Class<flixel.plugin.FlxPlugin>) : flixel.plugin.FlxPlugin

parameters
ClassType The class name of the plugin you want to retrieve. See the FlxPath or FlxTimer constructors for example usage.
returns
The plugin object, or null if no matching plugin was found.
Retrieves a plugin based on its class name from the global plugin array.

inline onResize(Width : Int, Height : Int) : Void

parameters
Width The new window width
Height The new window Height
Used by the game object to call onResize() on all the plugins.

inline onStateSwitch() : Void

Used by the game object to call onStateSwitch() on all the plugins.

remove(Plugin : flixel.plugin.FlxPlugin) : flixel.plugin.FlxPlugin

parameters
Plugin The plugin instance you want to remove.
returns
The same FlxPlugin-based plugin you passed in.
Removes an instance of a plugin from the global plugin array.

removeType(ClassType : Class<flixel.plugin.FlxPlugin>) : Bool

parameters
ClassType The class name of the plugin type you want removed from the array.
returns
Whether or not at least one instance of this plugin type was removed.
Removes all instances of a plugin from the global plugin array.

inline update() : Void

Used by the game object to call update() on all the plugins.
